thread.title: Chiranjeevi and Pranitha's intimate connection
thread.title_full: Chiranjeevi and Pranitha's intimate connection - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Chiranjeevi and Pranitha's intimate connection
text:
It's a special day today and a reason to celebrate. It's always nice when two Sandalwood stars share their special day, which gives us all double the reason to cheer.
Chiranjeevi Sarja and Pranitha Subhash both celebrate their birthday today. While Chiru turns 31, Pranitha turns 23, and we are sure that both of them have something special planned for the day.
We wish both the stars a very happy birthday.
